name: Kaagaz
headline: 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India
description:
Kaagaz is an 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India. With Kaagaz, these users can manage all the document requirements for their business using their smartphone itself, without needing a Desktop.

We have an active user base of 3Mn+ users and paid users north of 60,000+ - growing every month.

With over 200M such businesses in India, at $15/year subscription price, this a $3B opportunity in India & much larger globally.

We are a team of 2nd time entrepreneurs having scaled the pervious startup to $1M in GMV. We are backed by YCombinator, Goodwater Capital, Pravega Venture, Better Capital & other investors including Alan Rutledge (TrendMD) and Farid Ahsan (Sharechat)

founders.name: Snehanshu Gandhi, Founder
founders.description: 3X Entrepreneur. Engineer (IIT Bombay). MBA (ISB Hyderabad). Enjoy transforming ideas into Products. Building for Bharat.

founders.name: Tamanjit Bindra, Founder
founders.description: Tech co-founder who is learning the art of selling. Love B2C and scale (at which everything breaks). Thinks in Java, codes in everything. Backend developer.

founders.name: Gaurav Shrishrimal, Founder
founders.description:
2nd time Founder
Looks after Growth & Marketing at Kaagaz

# Documents Super App of Bharat
Document Scanner, PDF Reader, PDF Editor, Document Manager & Cloud Storage all rolled in one. 
[ ![Get it on Google Play](https://kaagaz.app/images/playsoter-icon.png) Get in On Google Play ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kaagaz.scanner.docs.pdf>) [ ![Download on the App Store](https://kaagaz.app/images/apple-icon.png) Get in On App Store ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/kaagaz-scanner-pdf-doc-scan/id1544400722?itsct=apps_box&itscg=30200>)

[ ![Your story Logo](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/yourstory1.webp) ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/yourstory.com/2020/07/app-fridays-kaagaz-scanner-made-in-india-alternative-camscanner>)

[ ![Moneycontrol Logo](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/moneycontrol1.webp) ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/startup/this-indian-startup-wants-to-be-the-new-camscanner-without-abusing-data-will-it-work-5776101.html>)

[ ![Timesofindia Logo](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/toi1.webp) ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/timesofindia.indiatimes.com/gadgets-news/desi-camscanner-kaagaz-scanner-gains-1-million-installs-on-google-play-store/articleshow/77760500.cms>)

## What is special about Kaagaz?
![Safe & Secure Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/protection.svg)
### Safe & Secure
Security of documents is core to Kaagaz. The app can work completely offline, making sure that the documents stay on your phone only. In case of cloud storage also, the documents are completely encrypted and stored on highly secure servers in India.
![No Watermark Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/watermark.svg)
### No Watermark.
Kaagaz doesn't have any unwanted Watermark in the App. You can infact have a 'Custom Watermark' to personalize your documents. Kaagaz provides you a seamless experience, that too completely Free.
![Built for Bharat Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/built.svg)
### Built for Bharat
Kaagaz is a completely Indian app built for the Bharat users. It is available in 8 Indian languages, giving you the freedom to use the app in a language that you are most comfortable in. 
## What all can you do with Kaagaz?
![Awesome Image](https://kaagaz.app/images/circle.png)
  * ![Edit Documents Image](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/slider-03.png)
  * ![Scan & Share Image](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/slider-01.png)
  * ![Store & Organize Image](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/slider-02.png)
  * ![Edit Documents Image](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/slider-03.png)
  * ![Scan & Share Image](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/slider-01.png)


[ ![Scan Share Icon](https://kaagaz.app/images/scan-share.svg) Scan & Share It is very easy to Scan any document using Kaagaz. Just click a photo, adjust the borders & apply filter of your choice and your document is ready to be shared as a PDF or Image. ](https://kaagaz.app/<#>) [ ![Cloud Strorage Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/cloud-strorage.svg) Store & Organize Kaagaz is also an organized storage space for all your documents on your phone. You can organize documents by making Folders in Kaagaz. You can also search for documents easily. Also, you can back-up documents on Kaagaz Cloud so that you don't lose them ever. ](https://kaagaz.app/<#>) [ ![Edit Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/edit.svg) Edit Documents Kaagaz has many tools that help you edit PDF documents easily. Whether it is to merge two documents, split any document, compress the document size etc. You don't have to now search for these tools separately and struggle with them.  ](https://kaagaz.app/<#>)
[ ![Get it on Google Play](https://kaagaz.app/images/playsoter-icon.png) Get in On Google Play ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kaagaz.scanner.docs.pdf>) [ ![Download on the App Store](https://kaagaz.app/images/apple-icon.png) Get in On App Store ](https://kaagaz.app/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/kaagaz-scanner-pdf-doc-scan/id1544400722?itsct=apps_box&itscg=30200>)
## Easy to use tools for your documents
![Auto Edge Detection Icon](https://kaagaz.app/images/detection.svg)
### Auto Edge Detection
Kaagaz can automatically detect edges of any document making it very easy & fast to scan documents. 
![Image Enhancement Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/enhanced.svg)
### Image Enhancement
Kaagaz can enhance the page quality significantly with its 5 different image enhancement filters. 
![PDF Reader Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/pdf-reader.svg)
### PDF Reader
Kaagaz is also your default PDF reader so that you don't need any another app to open PDF documents. 
![PDF Editor Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/pdf-editor.svg)
### PDF Editor
Kaagaz makes it very easy to edit PDF documents through its various tools for PDF Merge, Split, Compress, Rearrange, Lock, Unlock etc. 
![Document Manager Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/document-manager.svg)
### Document Manager
With Kaagaz you can organize your documents in folders easily instead of the complicated folder structure of your phone's file manager. 
![Cloud Storage Icon](https://gallery.kaagaz.app/web/images/storage.svg)
### Cloud Storage
Kaagaz Cloud gives you a safe & secure backup of all your documents. Documents are completely encrypted & stored on secure servers in India 
## Client Speaks
#### Gourav
Student
> So smooth and fast. I can guarantee you as a student it is one of the most useful and fast app. It beats most of the apps on Play Store and in fact on App Store\x9d. I love this fast responsive app. 
#### Anokhi
HR Professional
> It's the best app to make PDFs or documents. As there is no watermark, if you want you can add your own :). And no ads at all. I've till now shared this app with 5 people and they also have a good experience. 
#### Himanshu
Business Owner
> It's best app for scanning documents and I think everybody should download this app. It is very simple and perfect app for scanning. It gives a nice experience. You will not have to spend more time for croping and saving multiple files and it gives more options to select colour. 
#### Dilip
Student
> This is such a good app. Now I can easily make PDF and send to my teachers. My teachers said to be very good for making good PDF. I have alos suggested my friends about this app. They are very happy after downloading. Thank you Kaagaz Scanner. 
#### Gourav
Student
> So smooth and fast. I can guarantee you as a student it is one of the most useful and fast app. It beats most of the apps on Play Store and in fact on App Store\x9d. I love this fast responsive app. 
#### Anokhi
HR Professional
> It's the best app to make PDFs or documents. As there is no watermark, if you want you can add your own :). And no ads at all. I've till now shared this app with 5 people and they also have a good experience. 
#### Himanshu
Business Owner
> It's best app for scanning documents and I think everybody should download this app. It is very simple and perfect app for scanning. It gives a nice experience. You will not have to spend more time for croping and saving multiple files and it gives more options to select colour. 
#### Dilip
Student
> This is such a good app. Now I can easily make PDF and send to my teachers. My teachers said to be very good for making good PDF. I have alos suggested my friends about this app. They are very happy after downloading. Thank you Kaagaz Scanner. 
‹›

generated_description:
### Kaagaz: Revolutionizing Document Management for Mobile-First Businesses in India

Founded in **2019**, Kaagaz stands out as an innovative 'Office' suite designed specifically for mobile-first businesses in India. The mission is straightforward: empower users to handle all document-related tasks directly from their smartphones, eliminating the need for cumbersome desktop setups.

#### Growing User Base and Market Potential

With an active user base exceeding **3 million** and over **60,000 paid subscribers**, Kaagaz is on a robust growth trajectory. The app caters to the vast landscape of **200 million businesses in India**, setting the stage for a lucrative market opportunity valued at **$3 billion**, which only scratches the surface when considering global growth.

#### A Solid Founding Team and Support

The founders of Kaagaz are second-time entrepreneurs who previously scaled their last startup to a notable **$1 million in GMV**. Their experience is amplified by backing from prominent investors, including **Y Combinator** and **Goodwater Capital**, along with notable figures like **Pravega Venture**, **Better Capital**, **Alan Rutledge**, and **Farid Ahsan**.

#### Comprehensive Features of the Kaagaz App

Kaagaz is essentially a Swiss Army knife for document management. Here’s what it brings to the table:

- **Document Scanner**: Quickly captures and converts images into PDFs.
- **PDF Reader & Editor**: Edit, merge, split, and enhance PDF documents without extra software.
- **Document Manager**: Organize files effortlessly, using folders for easy access.
- **Cloud Storage**: Securely back up documents with end-to-end encryption on Indian servers.
- **Offline Capabilities**: Work without internet connectivity, ensuring data security by keeping documents local unless explicitly saved to the cloud.

What's particularly appealing is that Kaagaz is built with the Indian user in mind, supporting **eight languages** and being completely free of unwanted watermarks. Users even have the option to impose their own custom watermarks, providing a seamless experience without ads.

#### Impactful Reception

The reception has been overwhelmingly positive, with users hailing the app's speed, ease of use, and effectiveness. Testimonials highlight the app's capability to streamline document management, making it a favorite among students and professionals alike.

### Conclusion

In summary, Kaagaz is carving out a significant niche in the document management space by addressing the unique needs of mobile-first businesses in India. With a vibrant user base and a strong foundation to support future expansion, Kaagaz is well-positioned to become an indispensable tool for millions of users in India and beyond. 

To join the Kaagaz revolution, visit their website at [Kaagaz.app](https://kaagaz.app).
